title: Powerpc linking problems
body:
Hi.

```
cargo new hw --bin
cd hw
cargo run --verbose

   Compiling hw v0.1.0 (file:///data/ralvke/hw)
     Running `rustc src/main.rs --crate-name hw --crate-type bin -g -C metadata=93f2c833bbbf1eaa --out-dir /data/ralvke/hw/target/debug --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/data/ralvke/hw/target/debug/deps`
error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1
  |
  = note: "cc" "-Wl,--as-needed" "-Wl,-z,noexecstack" "-m32" "-L" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "/data/ralvke/hw/target/debug/hw.0.o" "-o" "/data/ralvke/hw/target/debug/hw" "-Wl,--gc-sections" "-pie" "-nodefaultlibs" "-L" "/data/ralvke/hw/target/debug/deps" "-L" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "-Wl,-Bstatic" "-Wl,-Bdynamic" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/libstd-610aec1c0c2edd5b.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/libpanic_unwind-f2d5dd75c5a64c5f.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/libunwind-cce8009dda26867d.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librand-d2f56491199d3b9f.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/libcollections-4f02fd86535a3157.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/liballoc-198f48436646c796.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/liballoc_system-22e63f2ceba0e6f8.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/liblibc-9b19cb4b417215a8.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librustc_unicode-8d6c34ad46f07f91.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/libcore-ec0461203eec19c8.rlib" "/home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/libcompiler_builtins-ad8606f391af463e.rlib" "-l" "dl" "-l" "rt" "-l" "pthread" "-l" "gcc_s" "-l" "c" "-l" "m" "-l" "rt" "-l" "util"
  = note: /data/ralvke/hw/target/debug/hw.0.o: In function `hw::main':
/data/ralvke/hw/src/main.rs:2: undefined reference to `std::io::stdio::_print::hc65bb59d948ef8bf'
/data/ralvke/hw/target/debug/hw.0.o: In function `main':
/data/ralvke/hw/src/main.rs:3: undefined reference to `std::rt::lang_start::ha64a47a344bdbb57'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

error: aborting due to previous error

error: Could not compile `hw`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc src/main.rs --crate-name hw --crate-type bin -g -C metadata=93f2c833bbbf1eaa --out-dir /data/ralvke/hw/target/debug --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/data/ralvke/hw/target/debug/deps` (exit code: 101)
```

```
rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.14.0 (e8a012324 2016-12-16)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: e8a0123241f0d397d39cd18fcc4e5e7edde22730
commit-date: 2016-12-16
host: powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.14.0
LLVM version: 3.9
```

Thanks for help
